show_name: Eiga Dokidoki! Precure Mana Kekkon!!? Mirai ni Tsunagu Kibō no Dress (movie)
other_title: 映画ドキドキ！プリキュア マナ結婚!!?未来につなぐ希望のドレス (Japanese)
plot: One day, Mana Aida receives a wedding dress from her mother and grandmother that they had worn in the past. While thinking about who she would wear this beside someday, a mysterious man named Marsh appears, and Mana is thrown back into the past. She was happy to see her grandmother she loved and her old dog Mallow, but she then realizes that Arisu and Rikka aren't there because memories have been altered. In order to save precious memories, the future, dreams and hope, Mana transforms into Cure Heart.
opening_theme: "Happy Go Lucky! DokiDoki! Precure" by Tomoyo Kurosawa
ending_theme: "Love Link (ラブリンク)" by Hitomi Yoshida
insert_song: "Treasure" (たからもの) by Mana Aida/Hitomi Nabatame, Rikka Hishikawa / Minako Kotobuki and Alice Yotsuba / Mai Fuchigami
